line.originaltext: 2. Add: 3/4 cup butter or margarine, softened at room temperature.
Mix in 2 eggs, slightly beaten and 2 teaspoons vanilla.
Mix in 2 eggs, slightly beaten and 2 teaspoons vanilla.
Mix together flour, salt and baking powder.
Mix together flour, salt and baking powder.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5}, ing9, "dry ingredients", "mix")

line.originaltext: 2. Add: 3/4 cup butter or margarine, softened at room temperature.

line.originaltext: Mix in 2 eggs, slightly beaten and 2 teaspoons vanilla.

line.originaltext: 4. Spread batter into a sprayed 9 x 13 inch metal pan.
4. Spread batter into a sprayed 9 x 13 inch metal pan.
5. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 25 minutes.
